Articles.Content:
I hope that this hasn't been brought up and answered already

I can't pinpoint the issue that caused this but I'm sure it's from installing some other mod. Right clicking on bay doors, there are no options to close them within the VAB and SPH. I'm not sure if it's B9-specific or done by another mod, but I also can't right click and enable "next/previous part" or "next/previous fuel setup".

http://imgur.com/j9yVdSL
